item.title: RusMap v2.54 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | April 5, 2025

RusMap v2.54 ETS2

Project “RusMap” – Global modification for the game Euro Truck Simulator 2. This modification has been developed since 2014 and covers the European part of Russia and the Republic of Belarus. The following regions are represented in Russia: In the north – Moscow, Leningrad, Tver, Novgorod, Pskov, Murmansk and the Republic of Karelia. In the west – Kaluga, Bryansk, Smolensk, Tula, Oryol, Kursk, Belgorod. In the south – Voronezh, Tambov, Penza, Lipetsk, Saratov and Volgograd regions. In the Republic of Belarus, six regions are represented: Minsk, Vitebsk, Mogilev, Gomel, Grodno and Brest regions.
The map is compatible with other popular projects such as ProMods, Roextended Map, SibirMap, Southern Region Map, Volga Map and many other modifications.

Cities in Russia:
Lyuban, Kirovsk, Bryansk, Valdai, Velikiye Luki, Veliky Novgorod, Velizh, Volokolamsk, Vyshny Volochok, Vyazma, Kaluga, Klin, Moscow, Nevel, Obninsk, Ostashkov, Porkhov, Rzhev, Roslavl, Smolensk, Tver, Kholm, Yukhnov, Tula, Kursk, Orel, Voronezh, Kolomna, Tambov, Borisoglebsk, Volgograd, Volzhsky, Krasnoslobodsk, Saratov, Engels, Lodeynoye Pole, Petrozavodsk, Medvezhyegorsk, Kem, Zelenoborsky, Sortavala, Priozersk, Suoyarvi, Tosno, Razmetelevo, Murmansk, Monchegorsk, Kandalaksha, Segezha, Alakurtti, Kolpino, Kola, Khimki.

Cities in the Republic of Belarus:
Cities in the Republic of Belarus: Baranovichi, Bobruisk, Brest, Vitebsk, Gomel, Minsk, Mogilev, Mozyr, Mstislavl, Orsha, Pinsk, Slutsk, Lida, Grodno, Slonim, Volkovysk, Polatsk, Glubokoe.

Roads in Russia:
M11, P208, P209, 86K-3, A101, A108, A111, A116, A119, A120, A123, A141, A144, A240, E20, M3, M5, M9, M10, M20, P21, P39, P47, P48, P50, P51, P57, P87, P89, P108, P115, P132, P228, P-236, P-298.

Roads in the Republic of Belarus:
M2, M4, M5, M8, M10, M11, P4, P15, P17, P21, P23, P26, P43, P96, P112.

Supported game versions:
Game version: 1.54 + DLC Going East! + DLC Scandinavia + DLC “Beyond the Baltic Sea” + DLC “Italia” + DLC “Vive la France” + DLC “Road to the Black Sea” + DLC “Iberia + DLC West Balkans”

List of changes in version 2.54:
New cities: Khimki, Sheremetyevo airport, the city of Moscow has been completely rebuilt.
Partially rebuilt roads M10 (E105), M9 (E22), M1 (E30), M3 (E101), A107, E119, 18K-2, 18R-01, E40, P228
Motorway M11 built
Motorway P208, P209 built.
Volgograd and Saratov regions updated.
Moscow region updated.
The Zelenoborsky – Kandalaksha road has been rebuilt.
The city of Kandalaksha has been rebuilt.
Changed vegetation in the Volgograd and Saratov regions.
Some changes in the cities: Volgograd, Volzhsky, Krasnoslobodsk, Tambov, Klin.
New police cars have been added.
New random events have been added.
Dynamic police officers at traffic police posts and on the roads.
Dynamic public transport.

A bug has been fixed at customs posts, on the border with Poland, Latvia and Lithuania.
A bug with the inability to take cargo with your trailer in some cities has been fixed.
A bug with incorrect display of forests in the northern parts of the map has been fixed.
The font of the city names on the signs has been fixed.
Minor optimization of the city of Grodno.
Minor optimization and changes in the city of Penza (elevation differences).
Many textures and models have been updated and optimized.
Fixed graphic and visual errors in different parts of the map.
Many other changes.

Installation procedure:
1. Unzip the downloaded file with the 7zip archiver.
2. Place all unpacked files in the My Documents/Euro Truck Simulator 2/mod folder.
3. Connect all files in the mod manager.

Compatibility with third-party modifications:
ProMods Map
Roextended Map
SibirMap 2.0 map
Southern Region Map
Volga Map

Credits: SCS Software aldimator dimon_26 - author of the north Schumi, Sergey061, Schura774 - support and development of the project. 10AVOID - author of SZM Addon Gricko, geohotin, klipstoeun8839, Jazzycat, DENLOG, Schumi - new models. CsewS, desirent - map testing Jazzycat - help in building the map, updating companies, new models, as well as help in building the Republic of Belarus. Vladzz-G - fixing registration numbers. paokkerkir - help with translation into Greek. wik412 - localization of cities. Huge thanks to everyone who took part in the construction of the map.

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: MAN Lion’s Coach 3rd Gen (2018-2025) v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | April 5, 2025

MAN Lion’s Coach 3rd Gen (2018-2025) v1.0 ETS2

MAN Lion’s Coach Gen 3 (2018-2025) By Heavy Vehicles Turkey (HVT)

Features:
Realistic engine and transmission values
​​Realistic engine sound (3 variants)
Realistic retarder sound (2 variants)
High quality model and textures
Center door camera
Reversing camera
Cabin accessory DLC support
All options between 2018-2024 are included in the vehicle
71 liveries
6 headlight options
6 front foglamp options
3 stop lamp options
2 rear fog lamp options (Reflector – Parking lights)
6 air horn options
2 air conditioning fan options

24 steering wheel options 2 cockpit GPS screen options (Standard – Facelift) Optional passenger lighting Optional ceiling lighting Optional interior ambient lighting Optional cockpit foot lighting Customizable paper sign (Template) Customizable plexiglass sign (Template) Customizable LED sign (Template) (Back – Front – Front top) Customizable cockpit flag (Template) Customizable jalousie curtains (Template) Customizable doormat set (Template) Realistic central screen that works with all its functions (Dashboard) GPS screen where the menu can be changed with the key (You need to assign an in-game entertainment screen key) Tachograph model options are available (Stoneridge SE5000 – VDO DTCO 1381 2.0 – VDO DTCO 1381 2.1) Optional entertainment system available (QR Code – TV) Football team coverings and flashing siren system (Included in the vehicle, you do not need to download additional mods) Reflective front LED sign Reflective top (for tourism companies) LED signage Interior beam lightings 3 types of tire options (Continental Conti Coach HA3 – Michelin X COACH Z – Goodyear Fuel-Max Lhs) MP supported mat options are available. And many more!

Credits: Heavy Vehicles Turkey (HVT)

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Traffic light v1.0 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | April 5, 2025

Traffic light v1.0 ATS

Mod increases the mode of traffic lights in 2 times. Also increased AI traffic refueling time, for cars from 15 to 30 seconds, for trucks from 30 to 45 seconds.

Required game version:
– 1.54.x

Credits: SCS, Schumi

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.

item.title: Project Russia Map v5.6.2a 1.54 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | April 5, 2025

Project Russia Map v5.6.2a 1.54 ETS2

Changelog:
– Huge fix of pink textures
– Fix the prefabs error on Promods
– Fix crash in some areas of RusMap
– Fix reports from Discord users
– Small changes on map

Counts 8 cities: Moscow, Noginsk, Voskresensk, Kolomna, Ryazan, Klin, Tula, Pokrov.
Mod can work without any additions. But if you need road connections you need RusMap

Credits: createdbaness

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
